EqSimIO Documentation

Author:
Brad Aagaard
Date:
2006/02/02
Version:
0.1.1

Summary

This directory tree contains a library for use in reading EqSim output files. An example of its use is contained in the example directory.

Installation

For installation instructions, see INSTALL .

Directories

  • doc Top-level directory for the documentation. If the documentation has been generated it will be in doc/html. Point a web browser to doc/html/index.html. The documentation can be generated if you have doxygen by running "doxygen doxyconfig" in the doc directory.
  • lib Directory holding library source code
The public interfaces are in the GeometryImporter and DataImporter objects. The other objects are used by these two objects to implement the reading of the data files.

  • examples Directory holding the source code for an example illustrating how to use the library. The example reads an EqSim geometry file and an EqSim data file and dumps information extracted from the files to stdout.

Format of files

For information regarding the format specification of the geometry and data files, see README.formats .

Version history

For information regarding changes, enhancements, significant bug fixes, etc. see CHANGES .
